title: Winter (Christmas Eve)
provenance_text:
Lauren Ford [1891-1973] until October 1936 [1]; Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), October 1936 until April 1, 1973 [2]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 20 in the 1936 "International Exhibition of Paintings" at the Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December 1936.
[2]. Mr. Rosenbloom purchased the painting from the above referenced exhibition for $600; it hung in the living room of his Pittsburgh residence. See "American Paintings and Sculpture to 1945 in the Carnegie Museum of Art," pages 195-196 and also copies of relevant digitized documents from Archives of American Art in curatorial file.
